name: Wbcom Designs â€“ Check-ins for BuddyPress Activity
author: Wbcom Designs

sections.description:
This plugin allows members to share their location when posting activities. Members can add places they have visited or nearby locations using the Google Place API.

Key Features:

  • AutoComplete Feature: Start typing a location name, and it will suggest nearby places based on your input. You can then select your desired location.
  • Google Map Integration: A Google Map is displayed for all activity posts that include a location.
  • Google Place API Key: A valid API key is required, which can be created from the Google Place Web Service Documentation.

If you need additional support, feel free to contact us for BuddyPress Check-ins.

Free Add-ons to Enhance Your BuddyPress or BuddyBoss Platform:

  • BuddyPress Member Reviews: Allow members to add ratings or feedback for other community members.
  • BuddyPress Group Reviews: Enable group ratings and reviews.
  • BuddyPress Activity Social Share: Share activities on social platforms like Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn.
  • Private Community with BP Lock: Make your community private, only accessible to logged-in users, while keeping selected pages public.
  • BuddyPress Job Manager: Integrate WP Job Manager with BuddyPress.
  • Check-ins for BuddyPress Activity: Let members add their location or check-ins to their BuddyPress activities.
  • BuddyPress Favorite Notification: Notify members when their activities receive likes or favorites.
  • Shortcodes & Elementor Widgets for BuddyPress: Use shortcodes and Elementor widgets for displaying BuddyPress activities, member directories, and groups.

Premium Add-ons:

  • BuddyPress Hashtags: Use hashtags in BuddyPress activities and bbPress topics.
  • BuddyPress Polls: Let members publish polls in BuddyPress or BuddyBoss activities and groups.
  • BuddyPress Quotes: Enable members to post updates with colorful and interactive backgrounds.
  • BuddyPress Status & Reaction: Let members set a status and offer reactions to activities.
  • BuddyPress Profanity: Filter and censor inappropriate content in activities and messages.
  • BuddyPress Sticky Post: Pin important activities to the top of the activity stream.
  • BuddyPress Auto Friends: Automatically assign global friends to new members.
  • Shortcodes & Elementor Widgets for BuddyPress Pro: Use advanced shortcodes and Elementor widgets for BuddyPress content.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire bp-check-in folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin require BuddyPress?

Yes, BuddyPress must be installed and activated.

What is the use of the API Key option provided in the settings?

With the Google Places API Key, users can check in to places with autocomplete suggestions when posting in BuddyPress. Selected locations are displayed on a map.

Does this plugin require location services?

Yes, users need to enable location services in their browser.

How can we add a place when posting?

Go to your profile’s post update section, click the map marker icon (if enabled), and type in the autocomplete box to select a location. Once selected, a map will display the location.

Where can I see all check-ins?

A filter option is available in the BuddyPress activity dropdown to show all check-ins.

  • Fix: Addressed PHP warnings when deleting places for smoother functionality.
